title: Personal Shop Help
body:
When I opened my shop, I got Riot Blitzcrank as the first skin. I got really excited because I am a Blitzcrank main. Then I left to go to camp for a few days and now that I am home, I see that the shop is closed. Is there any way you can help me out? I was about to spend 5$ to get it when I realized the shop had closed.  

Thanks

replies.body:
Your Shop shouldn't go away until June 6th, so it's rather odd that yours isn't showing up anymore. I included a screenshot of where you can find the personal shop again, but if it's still not showing up, take a screenshot of your client and shoot our billing team a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to figure out what's going on and get it fixed up for you there!

https://i.gyazo.com/55e8901315cba3751dbee11ddc36f38a.png
